alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued September 03 at 3:27PM AKDT until September 04 at 6:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Baldwin Peninsula and Selawik Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach may wash away. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Northwest winds gusting to 40 mph will develop this evening and continue tonight. These winds will cause high surf to develop. The highest surf and worst conditions will be along northwest facing shores such as at Kotzebue. Winds and surf will decrease early Monday.
info.instruction: Precautions should be taken to protect property.
